name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: This lecture is about the web search.

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: In this lecture we are going to talk about one of

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _the most important applications of text retrieval

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: So let's first look at some general challenges and

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: opportunities in web search.

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _Now
column6: many information retrieval algorithms had been developed at the

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: before the web was born.

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _So
column7: it created the best opportunity to apply _

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: those algorithms to major application problem that everyone would care about.

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _So naturally
column6: there had to be some further extensions of the classical _

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: search algorithms to address some new challenges encountered in web search.

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: So here are some general challenges.

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _Firstly

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _How we handle the size of the web

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: and ensure completeness of coverage of all the information.

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _How to serve many users quickly
column6: and by answering all their queries. _

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _All right

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _And before the web was born
column6: the scale of search was relatively small. _

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: The second problem is that there is low quality information.

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: And there are often spams.

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: The third challenge is dynamics of the web.

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: The new pages are constantly created and

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _some pages may be updated

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _So it makes it harder to

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _So these are some of the challenges that the

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _we have to solve in order to
column6: build a high quality web search engine. _

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _On the other hand
column6: there are also some interesting opportunities that we can _

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: leverage to improve search results.

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: There are many additional heuristics.

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: For example you know using links that we can leverage to improve scoring.

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: Now the errors that we talked about such as the vector space model are general

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: algorithms.

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _And they can be applied to any search applications

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _On the other hand
column6: they also don't take advantage of special characteristics _

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _of pages
column7: in the specific applications such as web search. _

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: Web pages are linked with each other so

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: obviously the linking is something that we can also leverage.

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: So because of these challenges and opportunities there are new techniques

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _that have been developed for web search
column6: or due to the need of a web search. _

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _One is parallel indexing and searching
column6: and this is to address the issue of _

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _scalability
column6: in particular Google's imaging of MapReduce _

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _is very inferential
column6: and has been very helpful in that aspect. _

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _Second
column6: there are techniques that are developed for

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: addressing the problem of spams.

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _So

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _We'll have to prevent those
column6: spam pages from being ranked high. _

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: And there are also techniques to achieve robust ranking.

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: And we're going to use a lot of signals to rank pages so

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: that it's not easy to spam the search engine with particular tricks.

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: And the third line of techniques is link analysis.

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: And these are techniques that can allow us to

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: to improve search results by leveraging extra information.

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: And in general in web search we're going to use

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: multiple features for ranking.

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: Not just link analysis but also exploiting all kinds of crawls like

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: the layout of web pages or anchor text that describes a link to another page.

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: So here's a picture showing the basic search engine technologies.

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _Basically
column6: this is the web on the left and then user on the right side. _

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _And we're going to help these
column6: this user get access to the web information. _

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: And the first component is the crawler that with the crawl pages and

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: the second component is indexer.

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: That will take these pages create an invert index.

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _The third component that is a retrieval

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _but the index to answer user's query
column6: by talking to the user's browser. _

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _And then

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _And
column6: and then the browser will show those results and

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: to allow the user to interact with the web.

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: So we're going to talk about each of these component.

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: First we're going to talk about the crawler also called a spider or

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: a software robot that would do something like a crawling pages on the web.

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: To build a toy crawler is relatively easy because you just need to start with a set

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: of seed pages and then fetch pages from the web and parse these pages new links.

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: And then add them to the priority of q and

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _then just explore those additional links

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: But to build a real crawler actually is tricky and

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: there are some complicated issues that we have do deal with.

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _For example robustness
column6: what if the server doesn't respond. _

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _What if there's a trap that generates dynamically generated webpages that might

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: attract your crawler to keep crawling the same site and

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: to fetch dynamically generated pages.

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: The results of this issue of crawling and

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: you don't want to overload one particular server with many crawling requests.

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _And you have to respect the

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: You also need to handle different types of files.

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _There are images
column7: all kinds of formats on the web. _

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: And you have to also consider URL extensions.

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _So

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _sometimes
column6: you have JavaScripts on the page that

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: And you ideally should also recognize [INAUDIBLE] the pages

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _because you don't have to duplicate to the

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _And finally
column6: you may be interesting to discover hidden URLs. _

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _Those are URLs that may not be linked

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _But if you truncate the URL to

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: you might be able to get some additional pages.

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _So
column6: what are the major crawling strategies? _

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _In general

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _because it naturally balance

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _You would not

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _Also parallel crawling is very natural
column6: because this task is very easy _

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: to parallelise and there are some variations of the crawling task.

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: One interesting variation is called focused crawling.

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: In this kind we're going to crawl just some pages about a particular topic.

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _For example

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _And
column7: this is typically going to start with a query

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: and then you can use the query to get some results.

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: From the major search engine.

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: And then you can start it with those results and gradually crawl more.

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _So one challenge in crawling is to find the new pages that people have created

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _and people probably are creating new pages all the time

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: very challenging if the new pages have not been actually linked to any old page.

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _If they are
column6: then you can probably refine them by recrawling the older page. _

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _So these are also some um
column6: interesting challenges that have to be solved. _

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: And finally we might face the scenario of incremental crawling or repeated crawling.

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _Right? So your first

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: let's say if you want to be able to web search engine.

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: And you were the first to crawl a lot of data from the web.

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _And then
column6: but then once you have collected all the data and _

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _in future we just need to crawl the

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _You
column7: in general you don't have to re-crawl everything

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: Or it's not necessary.

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _So
column7: you go as you minimize a resource overhead _

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _by using minimum resource to
column6: to just still crawl updated pages. _

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: So this is after a very interesting research question here.

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: And [INAUDIBLE] research question is that there aren't

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _many standard algorithms [INAUDIBLE] for doing this

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _Right? But in general

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: you can learn from the past experience.

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: Right.

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _So the two major factors that you have to consider are first

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: will this page be updated frequently?

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: And do I have to crawl this page again?

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: If the page is a static page that hasn't been changed for

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _months you probably don't have to re-crawl it everyday

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: Because it's unlikely that it will be changed frequently.

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _On the other hand if it's you know

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: sports score page that gets updated very frequently and

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _you may need to re-crawl it maybe even multiple times

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _The other factor to consider is
column6: is this page frequently accessed by users? _

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _If it
column7: that means it's a high utility page

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: then thus it's more important to ensure such a page to be fresh.

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: Compare it with another page that has never been fetched by any users for

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: a year.

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _Than
column6: even though that page has been changed a lot

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _it's probably not necessary to crawl that page or at least it's not as urgent as

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: to maintain the freshness of frequently accessed page by users.

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _So to summarize

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: web search is one of the most important applications of text retrieval.

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _And there are some new challenges particularly scalability

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _efficiency

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _There are also new opportunities particularly

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _layout

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: Crawler is an essential component of web search applications.

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: _And

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: Once is initial crawling and here we want to have complete crawling

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: of the web if you are doing a general search engine or

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: focus crawling if you want to just target it at a certain type of pages.

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: And then there is another scenario that's incremental updating of the crawl data or

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: incremental crawling.

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: In this case you need to optimize the resource.

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: For to use minimum resource we get the [INAUDIBLE]

name: 5 - 1 - 4.1 Web Search- Introduction & Web Crawler (00-11-05).srt
text: [MUSIC].
